title: Best Buy Founder Discusses State of Entrepreneurship
itunes:title: Best Buy Founder Discusses State of Entrepreneurship
description:
Dick Schulze, Founder and Chairman Emeritus at Best Buy, discusses the Schulze School of Entrepreneurship and the importance of education in business.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
